q: 1. What type of annealing process is described as giving periodic breaks from the KL constraint?
2. Which type of annealing process often causes premature collapse and repetitive patterns?
3. What is a result of using cyclical annealing compared to linear annealing in terms of pattern diversity?
options: A) Cyclical annealing has lower pattern diversity
B) Cyclical annealing has similar pattern diversity
C) Cyclical annealing maintains 2–3× higher pattern diversity
D) Linear annealing has slightly higher pattern diversity
